snippet: The rock musical “Revolution in the Elbow of Ragnar Agnarsson,” an import from Iceland, addresses the economic tumult in a town that resides in the titular body part.
abstract: Laura Collins-Hughes reviews rock musical Revolution in the Elbow of Ragnar Agnarsson Furniture Painter, written by brothers Ivar Pall Jonsson and Gunnlaugur Jonsson, at Minetta Lane Theater; Bergur Ingolfsson directs and Marrick Smith and Cady Huffman star.
lead_paragraph: The rock musical “Revolution in the Elbow of Ragnar Agnarsson,” an import from Iceland, addresses the economic tumult in a town that resides in the titular body part.

headline.print_headline: A Joint Laid to Ruin Bb Recession

headline.main: A Joint Laid to Ruin by Recession
